archivedBy.description: List archived issues archived by a specified account ID.

archivedDateRange.description:

issueTypes.description: List archived issues with a specified issue type ID.

projects.description: List archived issues with a specified project key.

reporters.description: List archived issues where the reporter is a specified account ID.
